extendedInfo.description: Quit smoking with Smoking Log by gradually reducing the number of cigarettes you smoke daily. Set goals and track your smoking habits easily. View history to track your smoking habits and progress over time.** Features **Summary View:* Displays a list of all recorded cigarettes* Warns you if you try to smoke before you have met your goal* Provides a summary for the day that tracks the number of cigarettes, time from last smoke, average time between cigarettesHistory View:* Allows easy comparisons of statistics between days* Provides an average of your smoking habits* Drill down into the summary view for previous daysChart View:* Visualize your progress across timeMiscellaneous:* [Plus] A widget to display today's summary* Easily configure/see your goals and how well you are meeting them* Insert cigarettes that you missed recording when you smoked them (ie: because you were driving)* Optional notification icon that displays last smoke status to quickly determine if you should wait to smoke or not* Frequent updates as needed*** NOTE: Features marked with a "[Plus]" are only enabled if you have purchased "Quit Smoking Log Plus License". There are (and will continue to be) features that are only available if you have purchased a license. I believed the "[Plus]" indication was enough to convey this but apparently I was mistaken. ****** NOTE: We are looking for help translating Quit Smoking Log into more languages. Contact us at smokinglog@ccswe.com if you would be willing to help ****** We want to have the best application we can so please rate us. If you have any suggestions for improvements or encounter any issues send us feedback in the application or by emailing smokinglog@ccswe.com ****** If you find this application useful or it helps you quit smoking (or you just hate the ads) please consider purchasing "Quit Smoking Log Plus License" to provide extra functionality and remove ads, https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ccswe.SmokingLogPlus ***

reviews.title: Best of 16 I tried
reviews.comment: Best for figuring out what your avg is. Can edit or add smokes later. This is good even if you are just thinking about quitting.  The first step is realizing how much you smoke.  I tracked myself for 10 days and started out with my worst days average and now I add a minute a day (between smokes) to my average and I don\'t add minutes over the weekend. It\'s better than nothing and it adds up over time. I may speed up my decrease after I get some space between me and these things, but doing something is better than nothing. Baby steps Bob:) If this helps me quit. I\'m paying the guy somehow. He should have a paid reward app like angry birds space for $5 and $1 goes to the american cancer society.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Killing my battery
reviews.comment: My phone is always low on battery now, uninstall.
reviews.author: marsha wichmann

reviews.title: Looks good so far
reviews.comment: Just started and I like the interface so far. Lets see where we are in a week.
reviews.author: scott weatherford

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used other apps such as this and they were harder to use and had less features. The UI is very easy to use and it\'s great that you can add one to your log if you forgot to.
reviews.author: Eric Staley

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: For a free program one of the best.  I\'ve seen a change in my smoking. I was smoking 2 packs a day. When I stopped using this I was back at 2 from 1. Trying it again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rating
reviews.comment: Perfect for me and easy to use. Im so happy I got it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and simple
reviews.comment: Jst a simple, basic app to let you record when you have a smoke.. Its all i wanted. Took me a while to work out how to record one if you forget to put it in at the time, but if you go to the help section it explains how to do that and its actually really simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs work.
reviews.comment: This app has really help me cut down a lot. When I started I was smoking about 20 a day now I am down to about 5-7 a day. The only thing it could be improved is now that I have cut down I only smoking half at a time, but there is no way to mark a half. That would really help. Great app love it.
reviews.author: Cassandra Fleming

reviews.title: First day with app
reviews.comment: Trying before I pay for key.  I would like a smaller widget to just record cigarette.  I don\'t want to see my counts for day or time since last cigarette at least not yet.  Also a way to input cost of pack to eventually see savings.
reviews.author: Stacie Sirois

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: This app is simple and easy to use.  Mostly use it at work to keep up with my last smoke.  I can\'t sat it has helped me to quit smoking but I do smoke less.   This is a great free app!
reviews.author: Lisa Aultman

reviews.title: Best app of it\'s kind!
reviews.comment: Best app for tracking smoking. These apps just remind me about smoking, I\'m trying something different.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just the app I was searching. Thank you.
reviews.author: Melvin Kong

reviews.title: It works if you work it!
reviews.comment: Great app! If you really want to quit, this is the app that will help you! *****
reviews.author: Christopher Rose

reviews.title: Jewels
reviews.comment: Hope it work i jus downloaded it i will re rate it after i use it
reviews.author: broid fan

reviews.title: Really helpful
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app and is really helping me to reach my goal.
reviews.author: Mary Harris

reviews.title: Looks like it may be good
reviews.comment: However, I refuse to use this app as although it clearly states, in my opinion, that a widget is included, it just advises you to purchase the pro version! A subtle [plus] is  not good enough. Tell us clearly on the Play Store page what is and isn\'t available in the free and pro versions as otherwise you seem deceitful Dev.
reviews.author: A Google User
